result.title: Biological protocols
result.description:
This deliverable will define the protocols to be used for biological analysis, including:
- cell culture protocol (UNILIM, ENEA and UNIPD) - protocols to isolate MB and GM CSC (ENEA, UNIPD and UNILIM) - in vitro ionizing radiations protocol (UNILIM and ENEA) - in vivo ionizing radiations protocol (ENEA) - tumour graft protocols for MB and GBM (UNIPD and ENEA).
